description.ko: 수천 년에 걸쳐 형성된 풍화된 토양과 미네랄 퇴적물의 복잡한 패턴을 포착하여 지구 지각을 심도 있게 탐구합니다.
description.en: A profound exploration of the Earth's crust, capturing the intricate patterns of weathered soil and mineral deposits formed over millennia.

prompt: Ultra-detailed macro photography of Earth's surface texture, showing deep fissures in dried clay, layered sedimentary rock, mineral veins in bronze and ochre, high-contrast shadows, 8k resolution, cinematic lighting, geological survey aesthetic.
